abilities.name: Spirit Pulse
abilities.effect: As long as Dusknoir is your Active Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon that has any Energy attached to it between turns.

attacks.name: Darkness Mist
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage.
